item.title: XY Utilities v1.0.1.2
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.0.1.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 10 Dec 2019 13:24:42 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- Arithmetic: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide
- Array: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Subset, Sway X and Y, Get X and Y
- DSP: Derivative, Average, Interpolate, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum

Release Notes: - Add Square.vi function
- Add Multiply and Divide XY (multiply or divide XY-data by another XY-data)
- Fix bugs in Derivative.vi and now allow user to choose units of dertivative interval
- Fix bugs in Add.vi and Subtract.vi when x or y input has an empty x or y array
- Update Subset Slider display
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: XY Utilities v1.0.0.1
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.0.0.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 06 Dec 2019 10:58:24 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- Arithmetic: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide
- Array: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Subset, Sway X and Y, Get X and Y
- DSP: Derivative, Average, Interpolate, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum

Release Notes: Initial build
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Graph Utilities v2.0.0.1
item.description:
Product: Graph Utilities v2.0.0.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 26 Nov 2019 16:46:28 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Misc. graph utilities

Release Notes: [2.0.0.1]
(*_*) Complete overhaul of Graph Utilities (*_*)
- VIs are now contained in class.
- Many low level VIs are basically wrappers for property nodes to modify, for example, graph labels.
- High level VIs will convert back and forth between Intensity Graphs and XY Graphs. Note: these operate directly on the graph object _by reference_
- Also functions are provided to take linecuts of an Intensity Graph with a defined width
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Transport v1.2.3.5
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.2.3.5
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 21 Nov 2019 08:56:25 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.2.3.4]
- Fix bugs in Lockin_Vsg and IV_Sweep
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.4.6.29
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.4.6.29
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 20 Nov 2019 22:04:22 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Program for logging PPMS status to the DSC. Provides a UI and API for controlling the magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (for PPM2)

Release Notes: [1.4.6.29]
- update API enums to be typedefs
- change PPMS(2) Client rentrancy

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)

Release Notes: [1.2.2.3]
